tagline: rubygem for getting data from yahoo's finance api
name: Yahoofinance
body:
### YahooFinance
This is the YahooFinance gem originally developed : http://www.transparentech.com/projects/yahoofinance. It works perfectly for basic, extended and historic stock quotes but needs updating to support a few other quote types, like Industries, to be extremely useful. 

### Authors and Contributors
Jordan O'Mara (@jsomara)

### Support or Contact
Open an issue! Contribute!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
